metadata.synopsis: Characters find a dead boar, but can't see any wound on its body. They wonder what killed it. (Astarion killed it and fed on it during the night. He's keen to move on and not examine it too closely.)

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Strange. It looks healthy, but it's stone dead.

1.speaker: Astarion
1.text: Who cares about some pig? It's dead - let's go.
